text.text_translated:
Do not always give good feedback and then bad feedback.
If you do this, the good feedback will lose its value.
People will not pay attention to it.
Sometimes, only give good feedback.
Give it only because it is good.
It is hard. Do not give advice to fix problems then.

best_attempt.text_translated:
`Feedback` is when you tell someone what you think about their work. It can be good or bad.

Don't always give good feedback and then bad feedback. If you always do this, the good feedback seems less important. People will not listen to it. So, sometimes, give only good feedback. Don't give bad feedback at these times.
